snippet: Senator Bernard Sanders is fighting to avoid entitlement cuts, posing a left-leaning obstacle in the fiscal negotiations. Also, the 2016 money race and the latest on Syria.
abstract: Senator Bernard Sanders is fighting to avoid entitlement cuts, posing a left-leaning obstacle in the fiscal negotiations. Also, the 2016 money race and the latest on Syria.

headline.main: TimesCast Politics: The Debate Over Cuts to Entitlements
